xxl.core.math.statistics.parametric.aggregates
Interface OnlineAggregation

All Known Implementing Classes:
EmpiricalCDFAggregateFunction, HybridKernelCDFAggregateFunction, NativeKernelCDFAggregateFunction, NKDEAggregateFunction, ReflectionKernelCDFAggregateFunction, RKDEAggregateFunction, SplineCompressedFunctionAggregateFunction
public interface OnlineAggregation

This class provides an interface for online aggregation functions. Online aggregation functions are dedicated to support an online control of the processed aggregation. Thus, online aggregation functions must at least support monitoring, i.e. the aggregation process can be 'watched' during runtime. Aggregation functions implementing this interface could be watched by getState(). Furthermore many aggregation functions depend on a (current) state in their computations. The state has to changeable during runtime. This could be done by using the setState(Object) method. Warning: Using the setState(Object) method could harm the correctness of the computed aggregation value.

See Also:
Aggregator

Method Summary
 Object getState()
          Returns the current state of the on-line aggregation function implementing this interface.

          Sets a new state of the on-line aggregation function implementing this interface (optional).
